title: See Chris Tomlin Concert in Atlanta and Stay at Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta
text:
The Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta offers affordable lodging to fans attending the Chris Tomlin concert in Atlanta on October 17, 2015.
 ATLANTA, GA, October 08, Fans attending the Chris Tomlin concert in Atlanta will find affordable lodging at the Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta, a leading Doraville GA hotel . The Dove Award winning Christian artist will be in Atlanta on his 'Love Ran Red Tour' on October 17. Special guests will be Rend Collective. The venue will be Infinite Energy Center, formerly the Arena at Gwinnett Center, in Duluth, Georgia.
"We look forward to welcoming Chris Tomlin fans," comments Samuel Head, the new General Manager at the Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta. "Our hotel is just a few minutes away from Infinite Energy Center," continues Head.
The Clarion Hotel and Conference Center features comfortable guest rooms with flat screen TVs and free high speed Internet. Some rooms offer the added convenience of a microwave, refrigerator, and sleeper sofa. The Clarion welcomes small pets. Property amenities include a business center, exercise room, and seasonal outdoor pool. Clarion's onsite restaurant, Perimeter Bar & Grille, is a convenient dining choice. As a guest convenience, this Doraville hotel provides complimentary weekday shuttle service within a 3-mile radius including the Doraville MARTA Station. Downtown Atlanta, the Buckhead shopping and entertainment district, and the airport are easily reached by MARTA train.
This north Atlanta hotel is located near the junction of I-85 and I-285. Choice Privileges members will earn reward points toward free hotel nights. AAA, senior, and military discounts are available.
For additional information about Chris Tomlin's 'Love Ran Red Tour' in Atlanta, visit www.infiniteenergycenter.com . To book your stay at the Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta, call 770-455-3700 or visit online at www.northatlantahotel.com .
About Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta
The newly opened Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta is located just off I-285 at Exit 32 near Doraville and is conveniently located 14 miles from downtown Atlanta. This north Atlanta hotel was built with features and amenities to ensure you'll truly have a great stay with us including complimentary Wi-Fi, meeting and convention space, seasonal outdoor pool and pet-friendly lodging. Guests will enjoy their stay at Clarion Hotel & Conference Center North Atlanta by Choice Hotels. The property participates in the Choice Privileges rewards program.
For more information visit www.northatlantahotel.com
